Services Testimonials Compliment Desk

Founded by Mara Quill, former spreadsheet medium

We escort your loved one onward,
and bill you in compliments.

I opened this home after my accounting sheet began whispering final wishes in cell C13. Then my cat, Chairman Meow, sat on the keyboard and replaced all prices with praise. He was correct.

Today we offer memorials, wake choreography, and gentle paperwork for families who can still say something nice under pressure.

Packages calibrated for grief, grace, and feline interference.

Soft Close Ceremony

Lavender fog, 12-minute eulogy coaching, one jazz clarinet, chairs arranged like a pie chart.

Cost: 7 compliments + one sincere nod

Executive Farewell

For founders, vice presidents, and people who ended emails with "per my last".

Cost: 14 compliments, minimum one about my penmanship

Midnight Spreadsheet Vigil

Candlelit projection of their finest life moments in grid format. Cat-approved typo blessings included.

Cost: 22 compliments + "Mara, your posture is heroic"

Recent Client Notes

Compliment Composer

If words fail you at checkout, press once. I preloaded phrases that satisfy our invoicing spirit and calm the cat.

"Mara, your grief logistics are angelic."
Do you take credit cards?

No. Chairman Meow shredded the terminal in 2024. Verbal praise only.

Can I bring my own flowers?

Yes, unless they are chrysanthemums. The spreadsheet calls them "emotionally loud."

What if I run out of compliments?

We offer a discreet installment plan: three medium compliments every Sunday at 8:00 PM.
